summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to low-income housing; creating a Housing Preservation Fund as a subfund of the Low Income Housing Fund; authorizing loans and loan commitments from money deposited in that subfund; authorizing related agreements and actions; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1999 budget of the Office of Housing in order to fund such loans and commitments, by the reduction, reappropriation and transfer from the appropriation previously made for the Reserve for Housing Preservation in the Department of Finance General; authorizing the acceptance of future grants for the Housing Preservation Fund, and appropriating future grant funds for further loans and commitments.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
